Articles.Content: can anybody explain to me why the servo on top of hte body doesnt move? ive tried three different servos in a similar fashion, and none of them move, the right click box for the part says its moving, but its not.

3 hours ago, putnamto said:

can anybody explain to me why the servo on top of hte body doesnt move?

No, not really. My best guess is that one of your mods (or a combination of them) interferes with the robotics. Or one or more of your game files got corrupted. Does it move when you change the setting in the PAW by hand and not via the KAL-1000?

3 hours ago, putnamto said:

the right click box for the part says its moving, but its not.

Well, the PAW (= right click window) doesn't say that it is moving as such, but that it will try to move to that position. Usually that is not an issue in the editor, but out in the field there can be quite a difference between the target angle and the actual angle. (In case you haven't noticed that already.)

I haven't messed with these much, but I did have one odd situation where the servo attached at the top rather than the bottom. The upper surface was not rotating and it took me a minute  to notice that the lower portion was.

Servos have always been a little buggy. Mess around with them long enough and they might fix themselves.

Another thing that works for me if undoing mirroring and symmetry, then reattaching them individually.
